instruction: Summarize this poem while retaining much of the original phrasing.
input:
A sharp word of scolding,
As I heard tonite.
No longer embracing,
Mental moves out of sight.

Peace and understanding,
Far away from here.
Left to battle aloud,
Feeling so much fear.
output: I was scolded harshly, leaving me feeling alone and afraid. There was no peace or understanding, only the muffled sound of a distant battle. My thoughts run away from me, my embrace of the world fading in the night.
